ygData.subject: RE: Are we Hybrids?
ygData.msgSnippet: Hrm... I wonder how this works... Faesong picks up her lute, singing a Lullaby to Golias.
ygData.messageBody:
"Hrm... I wonder how this works..."
Faesong picks up her lute, singing a Lullaby to Golias.


>-----Original Message-----
>From: Mike.Langlois@... [mailto:Mike.Langlois@...]
>Sent: Friday, January 21, 2000 10:09 AM
>To: eqbards@onelist.com
>Subject: RE: [eqbards] Are we Hybrids?
>
>
>From: Mike.Langlois@...
>
>
>
>Ahem. What I meant to say, um, was, ah...
>
>*Golias bolts for the exit, equipping his drum*
>=============
>From: "Perhaps a Princess..." <sarah@...>
>
>*raised eyebrow*
>What are you trying to employ about the female adventurers???
>
>Faesong, lvl 15 Songweaver of SOlusek Ro, Mythical Alliance, TEst
>
>
